title: Help with this beautiful thicker Serif?
content:
I love the thickness of the serif in this headline. Could someone please help me identify it? Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mount-sinai\_ad-father.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419022323/http:/typophile.com/files/mount-sinai_ad-father.jpg) | 134.16 KB |
author: efillingim

comments.content: Not Baskerville per se, but [Mrs Eaves](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419022323/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=109) smallcaps.
